org.jboss.netty.util
Class UnsafeDetectUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.jboss.netty.util.UnsafeDetectUtil

public final class UnsafeDetectUtil
extends Object

Utility which checks if class can be found in the classpath and that it can be accessed using "theUnsafe" field which is not true for all platforms, i.e Android where it is called "THE_ONE".
